lead_paragraph: Charlie Adam has criticised the decision to bring Celtic midfielder Scott Brown back into the Scotland squad to play England in a World Cup qualifier less than three months after he announced his international retirement.

headline.print_headline: Frustrated Adam Questions Brown's Scotland Recall
headline.main: Frustrated Adam Questions Brown's Scotland Recall

snippet: Charlie Adam has criticised the decision to bring Celtic midfielder Scott Brown back into the Scotland squad to play England in a World Cup qualifier less than three months after he announced his international retirement....
